title: personal identification number PIN
extract: Your Personal Identification Number (PIN) is a 4-digit number combination known only to you, and allows you to access your account information using our Automated Telephone Banking system. You may choose any 4-digit PIN number when using Telephone Banking for the first time.
extract_html: Your Personal Identification Number (PIN) is a 4-digit number combination known only to you, and allows you to access your account information using our Automated Telephone Banking system. You may choose any 4-digit PIN number when using Telephone Banking for the first time.
